ygData.subject: Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, Nice to see lots of email from this list. I,M a youngish, LOL, gramma and I,M addicted to EQ. I play a level 12 High Elf Magician on Morell
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone, Nice to see lots of email from this list. I,M
a youngish, LOL, gramma and I,M addicted to EQ. I play a level 12 High Elf
Magician on Morell Thule. It,s taken me 3 months to get that far alone as I
tend to ignore all the screaming little boys and explore and hunt alone. I
have been wondering about guilds also, and going of to new areas to explore.
            I,M not ready to start looking for a guild yet, but from
listening to conversations and reading lots of forums, I see that you have to
join to get to places you can,t fight alone.
            Morell Thule is a fairly new server, so there are lots of lower
level characters and there is a fair amount of roleplaying on it. If you
ignore or avoid all the little screamers it,s fun. I,m running out of things
to hunt in my area so will have to leave soon.
        As for female friends that don,t play , wow , they are not too
understanding, they think I have gone off the deep end. So I just don,t tell
them how much I play any more. I did get my daughter addicted too, so now I
have someone to talk to about the game..............Roseann in Minnesota
